messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level B1

Text saved: Asteroids are rocks that fly through space. NASA is now recording data about smaller asteroids which are at least 140 metres wide. Although it is believed that 25,000 of these asteroids exist, only about 8,000 have been logged so far. This is a serious danger because when a much smaller asteroid exploded over Russia in 2013, it injured 1,200 people.
Feedback received: Grade 1/10 - FAIL
